name: Epic Army Killer War
description:
Epic Army Killer War is the best and most challenging FPS shooter. Join the game and you can feel like a fearless commando member. Join the war and shoot the dangerous terrorists. You are a new star in the army, is the pride of the commando.This challenging game has a lot of missions, and each mission is very challenging and exciting, which makes the game very interesting and enjoyable.
Features:
- gorgeous 3D interface
- Smooth game control
- accurate aiming and shooting
- shocking game music and sound effects
- real ballistic and shooting effects
- Challenging missions
